sense.name: establish, ground
sense.commentary: Syntax Is: NP1 BASE NP2[abstract] PP[attribute]
sense.examples: He is basing his hypothesis on only one set of data. The chef based the recipe on a hundred year old French version. He bases many claims in the assumption of an objective reality.

sense.name: process
sense.examples: His hair caught fire while he was basing some cocaine.

sense.name: situate,station or place
sense.commentary: Syntax Is: NP1{agent] BASE NP2[patient[concrete]] PP[locative]
sense.examples: The company is basing its headquarters in Miami. The President based the troops in Kuwait.
